data.title: Their cupcakes ROCK. enough said
data.text: I love this place for their cupcakes.  They have a huge assortment and many specialty cupcakes as well.  I have tries the red velvet, salted caramel, black and white, and have not been disappointed.  Plus it's run by cool people who have been known to donate unsold cupcakes!

data.title: just ok
data.text: The idea of a gourmet cupcake shop excited me at first but then I purchased a $4 cupcake and it was dry. It did not taste fresh whatsoever. I gave them the benefit of the doubt and have gone back several times and never seem to be impressed with the cupcakes. I don't have a problem spending $4 on a cupcake if the flavor is decadent. There is plenty of room for improvement.

data.title: Helpful Staff and Great Desserts
data.text: Recently purchased a "baby shower" cake and cupcakes for 30 people from Happy Cakes. When picking these items up, there was no place to park in front of the store, so I had to park about a block away behind it.  It was pouring rain when I went in to get the items and I knew I couldn't carry both the enormous cake and the 24 cupcakes back to the car by myself, so, even though there were quite a few customers waiting to be helped, the manager (sorry, didn't get her name) was gracious enough to help me get the items back to my car (we went out the back door to shorten the trip) so I wouldn't have to make two trips.  The cake and cupcakes were tasty, delicious and substantial (my preference vs. fluffy cake), and were designed just as I had requested. It was a hectic, but gratifying experience and I'm happy to know they are there for the next event that calls for a professional and yummy dessert.

data.title: Happy Cakes, Rates!
data.text: Happy Cakes excites your tastebuds with real butter, cream, eggs, with moist unique cupcakes with out of this world icings!  They have daily specialties, $2 Tuesdays (our favorite) and special occasion cupcakes!  Stop in early or you might miss out on some of the best ones like Mexican Chocolate, Snickerdoodle, or any of the favorites!
